commit message:
ItemsContentProvider: Close Cursors instead of leaking them.

How tedious.

ItemsContentProvider: startRegularTasks(): Avoid unnecessary work.

Set a boolean whenever it's possible that work could be necessary, due to some data changes,
and don't bother checking otherwise.

ItemsContentProvider: Avoid even postDelayed() until necessary.

This should avoid some useless wakeups.
ItemsContentProvider: Queue regular tasks only on changes to the Items table.
ItemsContentProvider.queueRegularTasks(): Avoid queueing one if one is already queued.

Classify: Add a Restart option menu item, with an icon if there is room.

The icon is from the Action Bar Icon Pack:
https://developer.android.com/design/downloads/index.html#action-bar-icon-pack
ItemsContentProvider: Add Async suffix to a method, for clarity.
ItemsContentProvider: Remove unused METHOD_REQUEST_ITEMS method.

ItemsContentProvider.query(): 'next': Use queueRegularTasks() instead of downloadMinimumSubjectsAsync().

Because queueRegularTasks already has a way to avoid unnecessary parallel tasks.
It should still get done soon enough.
ItemsContentProvider.queueRegularTasks: Use a bigger delay.
ItemsContentProvider.queueRegularTasks(): Allow re-queuing to actually work.

ItemsContentProvider.queueRegularTasks(): Use Looper.getMainLooper().

Because I saw this exception once:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Can't create handler inside thread that has not called Looper.prepare()
Improve some log messages.
Add some comments about update() being called before onCreateView().

Comment out some unnecessary log output.

It is expected and uninteresting.
Remove unnecessary imports.
Fix some whitespace formatting.
strings.xml: Add comments for translators.
German translation: Slight improvements.
Add screenshots to help translators.
Add instructions for translating.

Add Italian and Spanish translations.

I bought these from Tomedes via Google's APK Translation service.
Italian, Spanish: Remove untranslatable stuff from translations.
Italian, Spanish: Correct ... to â€¦ .
Singleton: Add localeIsDifferent() so we can compare on configuration changes.

ClassifyFragment: showLoadingView(): Hide the child fragments when showing the loading view.

Because they should never appear together.

QuestionHelpFragment: Remove mSingleton that shadows the one in the base class.

This led to some unexpected null Singletons.
ItemFragment: Add initializeSingleton() to avoid some copy/pasted code.
QuestionFragment.update(): Don't continue if we are waiting for the Singleton.
fix

Singleton: Keep a list of callbacks instead of just one.

Otherwise, subsequent calls wipe out the previous callback, so it is
never called.
Singleton: Avoid calling the constructor twice just to discard one.

QuestionFragment: Use a TableLayout instead of GridLayout.

With TableLayout.setShrinkAllColumns() so the buttons do not go offscreen
when using longer text from translations. The distribution of widths is
rather odd and certainly does not lead to the ideal line breaks, but it's
better than before.

QuestionFragment: Make the TableLayout columns have equal widths.

update(): Use width=0 and weight=1 for the TableRow's children, and use
width=MATCH_PARENT for the TableRow, to make all columns have equal size.
Note that if width=WRAP_CONTENT then the TableRow's children will be
completely invisible.
And add extra placeholder FrameLayouts to fill the remaining cells in the last
column if there is more than one column.
QuestionFragment: Avoid trying to add a whole empty row.

QuestionFragment: Reduce the padding on the buttons to allow for longer text.

This is useful for the translations that might have longer text.

Italian translation: Fix a typo.

File upstream too:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/pull/179
DecisionTree: Use translations of checkboxes too.
ListFragment: Rename a constant to match the column name.
Support devices with API Level 15, instead of 16.
ListFragment: Ignore clicks on items that are still downloading.
